column4: what package do i need to install to get network file sharing
what package will enable me share files b/n two computers on ubuntu
depends what technology you want to use then, there's ftp, sftp as well as other
i want to use lan cable
that's not what I mean. How do you want to share the folder?
the transmission media is irrelevant, as long as there is a logical connection it doesn't matter what is used
i want to copy movie from my pc to my friends
ok but over LAN or WAN?
then samba or ftp will allow you to easily share files
can you tell me the command to install samba
gedit ~/.flexget/config.yml    wil open it ok, you have write access (everybody has write access)
then use nautilus to share folders
